Text:
I'd just like to thank you eztv, you are truly awesome for taking your time and effort to put up newly released shows for all of us.

People don't thank you enough, but you deserve acknowledgement. So I thank you to the full extent and wish you all the best in whatever your life entails eztv, keep up the good work. ;)
echo those sentiments. I'd have no way of watching the WSOP otherwise...
